TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Cipawkan, title = Cipawkan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cipawkan} }

S.FORM: Cipawkan Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Cipawkan a niyaro', 2,448 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 6,662 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 16% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,051 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 84% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5,611 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 13%, Truku 2%, roma 0.5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.

Cipawkan Itiniay i Hoalien Cen no Hoalien ko Cipawkan a niyaro', 2,448 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 6,662 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 16% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,051 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 84% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5,611 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 13%, Troko 2%, roma 0.5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.
